channel.title: Message weird glitch
channel.description:
#### What happened? Gave me link to old topic(that was unlisted) #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Nothing shows up #### Steps to reproduce: Name a message __2, yeet down to suggested messages inside a message #### Comments: Holy Jesus. What is that? What the fuck is that? WHAT IS THAT, PRIVATE SYSTEM??
Also Note: Before anyone comes on saying “it’s cause you bookmarked it” You have to find the topic/post BEFORE you bookmark it. ![image|690x224](upload://pMzRi0SUUPni2GoUgBlBcPYPF5x.jpeg) ![image|299x500](upload://hAlLSCWwtBH22opF2KZF7vSG2bQ.jpeg)

item.title: Message weird glitch
item.dc:creator: Lightsin
item.description:
What happened?

Gave me link to old topic(that was unlisted)

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Nothing shows up

Steps to reproduce:

Name a message __2, yeet down to suggested messages inside a message

Comments:

Holy Jesus. What is that? What the fuck is that?
WHAT IS THAT, PRIVATE SYSTEM??

Also Note: Before anyone comes on saying “it’s cause you bookmarked it”
You have to find the topic/post BEFORE you bookmark it.

Read full topic
